naslov: Luksuzna vila sa pogledom na more 284 m2, Tar-Vabriga (prodaja)
opis: Ova ekskluzivna vila nalazi se u blizini centra grada samo nekoliko kilometara od mora i nudi apsolutni luksuz i privatnost. Osim modernog dizajna, ovu vilu karakterizira visoka kvaliteta i funkcionalnost. Imanje veličine 843 m2 okruženo je prekrasnim krajolikom, a u vrtu se nalaze mediteranske masline, bazen sa slanom vodom (39 m2), terasa za sunčanje i vanjska kuhinja. U prizemlju vile nalazi se prostrani dnevni boravak s kaminom, blagovaonica, potpuno opremljena kuhinja i ostava. U prizemlju se nalaze i dvije spavaće sobe (jedna s krevetom na kat - koja se može koristiti i kao radni prostor) i kupaonica. Na gornjoj etaži nalaze se tri spavaće sobe, svaka sa svojom kupaonicom. Vrhunac je pak mali wellness s whirlpoolom i finskom saunom, koji su pak povezani s velikom terasom s koje se pruža savršen panoramski pogled na more. Cijela kuća je opremljena najsuvremenijom LED rasvjetom. Podno grijanje (dizalica topline) može se individualno regulirati u cijeloj kući pomoću zasebnih termostata. Tu je i solarni sustav, a kuća je naravno i klimatizirana. Trostruko ostakljeni aluminijski prozori, visokokvalitetne Catalano pločice, elegantna klizna staklena vrata za kupaonice, Grohe okovi, ugradbeni ormari i kreveti izrađeni po narudžbi standardni su. Kuća je pod video nadzorom i ima alarmni sustav. Agencijska provizija naplaćuje se u skladu s Općim uvjetima poslovanja koji su dostupni na stranici www.venera-nekretnine.hr / cijenik usluga. This exclusive villa is located near the city center just a few kilometers from the sea and offers absolute luxury and privacy. In addition to its modern design, this villa is characterized by high quality and functionality. The 843 m2 property is surrounded by beautiful scenery, and the garden features Mediterranean olive trees, a saltwater pool (39 m2), a sun terrace, and an outdoor kitchen. On the ground floor of the villa, there is a spacious living room with a fireplace, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a pantry. On the ground floor there are also two bedrooms (one with a bunk bed - which can also be used as a workspace) and a bathroom. On the upper floor there are three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom. The highlight is a small wellness area with a whirlpool and a Finnish sauna, which in turn are connected to a large terrace with a perfect panoramic view of the sea. The entire house is equipped with state-of-the-art LED lighting. Underfloor heating (heat pump) can be individually regulated throughout the house using separate thermostats. There is also a solar system, and the house is of course air-conditioned. Triple-glazed aluminum windows, high-quality Catalano tiles, elegant sliding glass doors for bathrooms, Grohe fittings, built-in wardrobes and custom-made beds are standard. The house is under video surveillance and has an alarm system. The agency commission is charged in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions available on the www.venera-nekretnine.hr / price list page.
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Horvaćanska cesta 43, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
